thread.title: Boy, 12, seriously injured in incident at Oracle shopping centre
thread.title_full: Boy, 12, seriously injured in incident at Oracle shopping centre | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Boy, 12, seriously injured in incident at Oracle shopping centre
text:
A 12-year-old boy is in a life-threatening condition following an incident in Reading.
A spokesman for South Central Ambulance Service said: " We received the call at 4.12pm to reports of a 12-year-old boy who was suffering a serious medical emergency.
"He was in a life-threatening condition.
"We sent three ambulances and two officers in a rapid response vehicle.
"After treatment at the scene he was taken to the Royal Berkshire Hospital still in a life-threatening condition."
Joe @JOEaRKay Follow Ambulance outside of @ oraclereading and @ topmanuk closed and cordoned off. Police and shop security also present. https://t.co/6eCad9d1I2
